--------------34393482DEECAB8EED697402
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Hot Rod::

He finally came out of his room. He had a new body. He now stood 15 feet
tall. The body was a suped up version of his old one. The Maximal on
board computer had been taken out. A old Autobot transformation cog had
been installed. His weapons were now useing lasers instead of plasma
charges. He had mini rockets installed in launchers on his back. And the
Maximal symbol on his chest was gone. In its place the symbol he wore
for so many years... the Autobot one.
Hot Rod was once again an Autobot.

OOC: I have included a pic of his new look.
